channel.title: Help with jarsigning
channel.description: Okay,this is the problem i am having.My jarsigner.exe in my java files don't work.Can i use jar.exe instead?

item.title: Help with jarsigning
item.dc:creator: @A_L_I_V_E A L I V E
item.description:
@A_L_I_V_E wrote:

Aha…thank you very much Miss Silabsoft,never thought you would actually reply to my posts…lol

Read full topic

item.title: Help with jarsigning
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:


jarsigner -keystore yourkeystorefile -storepass yourstorepass -keypass yourkeypass jarfile alias

here is an example

jarsigner -keystore silabs_keystore.jks -storepass mooooooooo -keypass baaaah123 client.jar silabsoft

to create a keystore file

keytool -genkey -alias yourname -keyalg RSA -keysize 1024 -keypass yourpassword -keystore keystorefilename -storepass yourstorepass

here is an example:

keytool -genkey -alias silabsoft -keyalg RSA -keysize 1024 -keypass baaaah123 -keystore silabs_keystore.jks -storepass mooooooooo

Read full topic
